N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.4 - Responsibility for payment

State Regulations
(a) For current recipients of HR and ADC, the
social services district shall include in the income maintenance grant the cost
of home-delivered meals in accordance with department regulations, and the
recipient shall pay the full cost to the provider directly. (See Schedule SA-5, section
352.7
[c]
of this

Title.)
(b) For beneficiaries of
SSI who were former recipients of AABD and had an allowance included within the
grant for home-delivered meals when these cases were transferred to the SSI
program, the recipient shall pay the full cost of the service directly to the
provider. (c) For all other SSI
beneficiaries, the social services district shall pay the provider for the cost
of preparation and delivery of home-delivered meals, and the recipient shall
pay the provider for the cost of raw food. Notes
